title: Capacity and types of facilities offered at GRAVES SPORTS CENTRE S8 & statistics concerning the level of use

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please could you provide the statistics concerning  how often the sports halls at graves sports centre S8 have been used in the last 12 months, that is, number of courts available and how many bookings have been made within the period. Statistics for tennis, squash, table tennis and any other sports offered in the halls are required.
Yours faithfully,
Susan Mills-Pullan
